front.title: Using the Protected One-Time Password Protocol for EAP-FAST Provisioning

abstract.t: EAP-FAST is an extensible EAP method that enables the provisioning of credentials or other information by using the Transport Layer Security (TLS) to establish a mutually authenticated tunnel. As the tunnel may be unauthenticated, EAP-FAST further enables the use of inner EAP methods to establish mutual authentication prior to provisioning. This document describes how EAP-POTP may be used as the EAP-FAST inner method for credential provisioning.
